name: Biome
description: A toolchain for web projects, aimed to provide functionality of many separate tools. Successor to Rome
contributions: I am the creator and lead of the project. I contributed to different parts of the projects, such as the CLI, the LSP, many lint rules, and the formatter.

name: Astro
description: The web framework for content-driven websites
contributions: I am currently part of the Core Team. I contributed to the project by implementing the middleware feature, and the edge middleware system for some the official adapters. New build system, i18n and CSP.

name: Webpack
description: A static module bundler for modern JavaScript applications

name: Standard
description: JavaScript Standard Style - One style to rule them all

name: Rome
description: A toolchain for web projects, aimed to provide functionality of many separate tools
